verse.roman:
indro viśvāvasuḥ śrotā
elāpatras tathāṅgirāḥ
pramlocā rākṣaso varyo
nabho-māsaṁ nayanty amī

synonyms: indraḥ viśvāvasuḥ śrotāḥ—Indra, Viśvāvasu and Śrotā; elāpatraḥ—Elāpatra; tathā—and; aṅgirāḥ—Aṅgirā; pramlocā—Pramlocā; rākṣasaḥ varyaḥ—the Rākṣasa named Varya; nabhaḥ-māsam—the month of Nabhas (Śrāvaṇa); nayanti—rule; amī—these.
translation: Indra as the sun-god, Viśvāvasu as the Gandharva, Śrotā as the Yakṣa, Elāpatra as the Nāga, Aṅgirā as the sage, Pramlocā as the Apsarā and Varya as the Rākṣasa rule the month of Nabhas.
